page.title: 05LOWDHAM GRANGE.
page.content: Some people think that Lowdham Grange is a police station of some kind but it is a borstal.In some ways they are the same,the officers wear uniform and they have cells but people only go in there if they have done something wrong. There are two farms nearby called Grange Farm and Hunters Hill Farm.Both have cows but Hunters Hill has pigs and hens as well. Also there is an estate on the land with about seventy houses,but only forty of them are being lived in. There are woods,cricket and football pitches,a swimming pool and a club. A bus service passes the bottom of the back drive and there are two school buses,one for the local Comprehensive at Calverton and one for Lowdham C.E. Primary School.
